hero.description: Professional immigration mentorship for Brazilians looking to start a new life in Europe. Our expert team guides you through every step of your journey.

services.title: Our Immigration Services
services.description: Comprehensive support for every step of your European immigration journey.

list.title: Visa & Documentation
list.description: We guide you through the complex visa application process and help prepare all necessary documentation.

list.title: Education Equivalence
list.description: Get assistance with validating your Brazilian degrees and certificates for European recognition.

list.title: Job Search & CV analysis
list.description: Receive personalized guidance on finding employment opportunities that match your skills and experience. We will also help you with your CV analysis and job search.

list.title: Housing Assistance
list.description: Learn how to find accommodation and navigate the housing market in your destination country.

list.title: Language Solutions
list.description: Access resources and strategies for overcoming language barriers in your new European home.

list.title: Cultural Integration
list.description: Prepare for cultural differences and learn how to adapt smoothly to your new environment.

about.title: About Our Team
about.description_1: Founded by a team of immigrants from Brazil, our team consists of professionals, advisors, and cultural integration experts who have personally experienced the journey from Brazil to Europe.
about.description_2: We understand the challenges, complexities, and emotional aspects of relocating to a new country, and our mission is to make this transition as smooth as possible for our clients.
about.description_3: Our combined experience spans over 5 years of experience in gathering information, and helping Brazilians successfully establish new lives across various European countries including Portugal, Spain, Germany, Italy, and France.

testimonials.title: Success Stories
testimonials.description: Hear from Brazilians who successfully started their new lives in Europe with our help.

list.quote: The guidance I received throughout my immigration process was invaluable. From visa applications to finding my first apartment in Lisbon, the team was always there to help.
list.author: Carlos Silva

list.quote: As a healthcare professional, I was worried about getting my credentials recognized in Germany. Thanks to this mentorship, the process was much smoother than I expected.
list.author: Ana Oliveira

list.quote: Moving my entire family to Spain seemed overwhelming at first, but with expert guidance on schools, housing, and cultural integration, we now feel right at home.
list.author: Rafael Mendes

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.description: Our proven 4-step process guides you through every aspect of your immigration journey, from initial contact to successful integration.

step1.title: Contact & Situation Assessment
step1.description: Initial contact where we understand your situation, assess the complexity of your immigration process, and identify all necessary documentation requirements.

step2.title: CV & Strategic Job Applications
step2.description: We help build your professional profile and guide you through strategic job applications to secure employment opportunities in Europe.

step3.title: Arrival Assistance
step3.description: After securing a job, we assist with all bureaucratic steps for traveling and arriving in Switzerland, including documentation, apartment hunting, and settlement procedures.

step4.title: Feedback & Maintenance
step4.description: We continuously assess your progress and gather feedback to ensure your successful integration and ongoing support throughout your European journey.

questions.question: How long does the immigration process typically take?
questions.answer: The timeline varies depending on the destination country and visa type, but most clients complete their move within 6-12 months.

questions.question: Do I need to speak the local language?
questions.answer: While helpful, it's not always required. We can guide you through language requirements and provide resources for learning.

questions.question: What are your service fees?
questions.answer: Our fees vary based on the complexity of your case and services needed. We provide a clear breakdown during your free consultation.
